code: public void testLocalExporterRemovesListenersOnClose() {     final ClusterService clusterService = mock(ClusterService.class).     final XPackLicenseState licenseState = mock(XPackLicenseState.class).     final Exporter.Config config = new Exporter.Config("name", "type", Settings.EMPTY, clusterService, licenseState).     final CleanerService cleanerService = mock(CleanerService.class).     final LocalExporter exporter = new LocalExporter(config, mock(Client.class), cleanerService).     verify(clusterService).addListener(exporter).     verify(cleanerService).add(exporter).     verify(licenseState).addListener(exporter).     exporter.close().     verify(clusterService).removeListener(exporter).     verify(cleanerService).remove(exporter).     verify(licenseState).removeListener(exporter). }
